00039  || defined(ATSAMR21G18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E19A)
00040 /******************************************************************************
00041                    Types section
00042 ******************************************************************************/
00043 typedef  uint32_t atomic_t;
00044 
00045 /******************************************************************************
00046                    Inline static functions section
00047 ******************************************************************************/
00048 /******************************************************************************
00049  Disables global interrupt. Enter atomic section.
00050 ******************************************************************************/
00051 void halStartAtomic(atomic_t volatile *pAtomic);
00052 
00053 /******************************************************************************
00054  Exit atomic section
00055 ******************************************************************************/
00056 void halEndAtomic(atomic_t volatile *pAtomic);
00058   #define ATOMIC_SECTION_ENTER  {volatile atomic_t __atomic; halStartAtomic(&__atomic);
00059 
00060   #define ATOMIC_SECTION_LEAVE  halEndAtomic(&__atomic);}
00061 #elif defined(ATMEGA1281) || defined(ATMEGA2561) || defined(ATMEGA1284) || defined(AT90USB1287) \
00062    || defined(ATXMEGA128A1) || defined(ATXMEGA256A3) || defined(ATXMEGA128B1) || defined(ATXMEGA256D3) \
00063    || defined(ATMEGA128RFA1) || defined(ATMEGA256RFR2) || defined(ATMEGA2564RFR2)
00064 
00065   #define ATOMIC_SECTION_ENTER {atomic_t __atomic = halStartAtomic();
00066 
00067   #define ATOMIC_SECTION_LEAVE halEndAtomic(__atomic);}
00068 #elif defined(SIMULATOR)
00069 
00070   #define ATOMIC_SECTION_ENTER  do {} while (0);
00071 
00072   #define ATOMIC_SECTION_LEAVE  do {} while (0);
00073 #elif defined(WIN)
00074 
00075   #define ATOMIC_SECTION_ENTER {halStartAtomic();
00076 
00077   #define ATOMIC_SECTION_LEAVE halEndAtomic();}
00078 #endif
00079
